sn45.21:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong way and the right way.
sn45.21:4.4: And what is the wrong way?
sn45.21:4.6: wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong samādhi.
sn45.21:4.8: This is called the wrong way.
sn45.21:4.9: And what is the right way?
sn45.21:4.11: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.21:4.13: This is called the right way.”
